title: How-To Guide for Using the TableOfContents Component
description: This guide details the usage of the TableOfContents component, including setup, examples, and error handling strategies.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: The TableOfContents component is designed to create a navigable table of contents for a webpage. It automatically detects headings in the document and allows users to scroll to them smoothly.

Display a Table of Contents
Smooth Scrolling
Date Formatting
Highlight Active Heading
To initialize the TableOfContents component, you need to pass optional props for publishDate, modifiedDate, and author.
Import the TableOfContents component and use it in your JSX, passing the necessary props.
Ensure to handle cases where the headings are not found or if the component fails to render properly.
Always validate the props passed to the component to avoid runtime errors.
